meta.title: An Overview of the Sampang Region

nodes.body: The Sampang are a Rai ethnic group of eastern Nepal who speak a Tibeto-Burman language of the same name. According to the 2001 census of Nepal, 10,810 people speak Sampang as a mother tongue. (Mark Turin â€“ June 01, 2004)
nodes.title: An Overview of the Sampang Region
